query:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(a.price) AS volume, SUM(a.usd_price) AS volume_usd
            FROM activities a
            WHERE a.tx_type = 'buy'
                AND a.collection_id = $1
                AND ($2::INTERVAL IS NULL OR a.block_time >= NOW() - $2::INTERVAL)
            GROUP BY a.collection_id
